name: react-generator
description: React-generator is a shadowrun char generator for the fifth edition. based on react and flux.

scripts.prepare: npm run clean && npm run mkdirs && npm run jade && npm run stylus:server && npm run js:server
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run mkdirs && npm run jade && npm run stylus:build && npm run js:build
scripts.server: npm run prepare && light-server -b 0.0.0.0 -s build -p 8000 -w 'app/scripts/**/*.js # npm run js:server' -w 'app/stylus/**/*styl # npm run stylus:server # reloadcss' -w 'app/jade/**/*jade # npm run jade'
scripts.js:server: browserify app/scripts/index.js --debug -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] > build/scripts/main.js
scripts.js:build: browserify app/scripts/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] > build/scripts/index.js && npm run uglifyjs
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:only
scripts.release:patch: bumpery --verify='npm test' --no-push --no-commit --no-createTag --versionType patch && npm run changelog && npm run release:commit
scripts.release:minor: bumpery --verify='npm test' --no-push --no-commit --no-createTag --versionType minor && npm run changelog && npm run release:commit
scripts.release:major: bumpery --verify='npm test' --no-push --no-commit --no-createTag --versionType major && npm run changelog && npm run release:commit
scripts.cover: npm run cover:prepare; npm run cover:run

author: Poltergeist
